meanings: (줄·끈 등으로) be tied (up), be bound, (체인으로) be chained, (동물 등이 말뚝에) be tethered

meanings.meaning: kiss[marry, be introduced to] the gunner's daughter
her hands tied behind her back

vlive.korean: 묶여서 풀 수조차 없어요. It's tied, so I can't even untangle them. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 🍑복자매🍑의 서로 해주는 가방공개 (NAYEON&MOMO showing their bags)
vlive.english: It's tied, so I can't even untangle them.

vlive.korean: 새로운 아이디어가 - 새로운 아이디어 묶여서 나올 겁니다. A new idea... - A new idea is going to come out tied up. 듣기 View video BRANDNEWBOYS : 커피될게 우유해줘
vlive.english: A new idea... - A new idea is going to come out tied up.

vlive.korean: 그 어떤 대비되는 캐릭터가 한팀으로 묶여서... Those two contrasted characters... 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 목] 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! (게스트: 부산행 신스틸러) Movie talk!talk!
두 분이 묶여서 물을 젓는 장면은 최고였어요. They rowed together after being tied up was so fun. 듣기 View video 10PM : 목요일 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: They rowed together after being tied up was so fun.

examples.korean: Bound hand and foot, I am quite helpless. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손발이 묶여서 몸이 자유롭지 못하다 Neungyule
examples.english: Bound hand and foot, I am quite helpless. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Tied up with my hectic schedule everyday, I have never had a chance to enjoy what Seoul has to offer,' said Kim Joo-ee, an office worker in Seoul. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 똑같은 스케줄에 묶여서 서울에 있는 것들을 즐겨볼 기회가 없었다.'라고 서울의 한 회사원 김주이씨가 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Tied up with my hectic schedule everyday, I have never had a chance to enjoy what Seoul has to offer,' said Kim Joo-ee, an office worker in Seoul. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This wooden instrument has a long vacuum tube to echo the tune produced by the strings tied over it and supported by bridges. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 나무로 만들어진 악기에는 긴 진공관이 있는데 악기 위쪽에 묶여서 줄받침에 의해 지탱되고 있는 줄들이 내는 선율이 이 진공관 속을 통해 울려나온다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This wooden instrument has a long vacuum tube to echo the tune produced by the strings tied over it and supported by bridges. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were brought to the police station in chains. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 쇠사슬에 묶여서 경찰로 연행되었다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: They were brought to the police station in chains. Add to Wordbook
